com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools

Class MakeLDIF

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ConsoleApplication
      • com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools.MakeLDIF

  • public final class MakeLDIF
extends com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ConsoleApplication
    Program that generate LDIF content based on a template.

                      PrintStream err,
                      String... args)
        This method should be used to run this tool programmatically. Output and errors will be printed on provided PrintStream.
